text: Kha fhum kegi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe buiva hura bakɨme fara muuŋgiap nza behuigiap thivgia kav, Fhe Bakɨme khothɨgɨrga tɨvir nza khɨvi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza mba nzan suirigim, nza vhemkora khuafui fhuv bigi, nza za nta kuegɨri. Nza vhɨra mba zazera nzan suiga havhari tɨva mbatɨgeŋ, nza vhɨra ne kuegɨri. Nza ne kuegɨp, nza wari wo ndavi havhargip, ŋkasŋkagip, Fhe Bakɨme nza sarigi khuafɨ, nza anan khuafurga.
